Wolfblade::

She shook her head at him. "Please, do not make any rash decisions.
Please make sure this is a choice you really want to make. If she is
the one whom your spark really wants, I will understand. I am a
warrior. Making tough choices is all about being strong."  She lowered
her head. "I thought I was strong. I thought I could make the hard
choice so you didn't have to."  She still stood next to him, but her
optics were staring at the ground. "Forgive me. You must think me
weak. I just want to do the right thing and make you happy."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice::
>  
> He holds her close to him as their lips meet again.  All other
sensation fades away, just the warmth of her body against his and
their lips pressed against each other.  The moment could have lasted
eternity, they would not notice or care.  after a bit, he pulled back,
breaking the contact between them.  
> 
> "I'll go talk with Blacknightmare, I should not be long.  Stay here,
and wait for me..."
> 
>
